channel.title: Mod/ modulus
channel.description:
is there a way to use the mod operator on two numbers... ex:
3 % 7 = 3 7 % 3 = 1
or like
3 mod 7 = 3.... etc
thanks.
wow lol EDIT: i realized i had typed in; nummodnum and not num mod num ... hah sorry it didn't see the keyword mod

item.title: Mod/ modulus
item.dc:creator: @yomama yomama`
item.description:
@yomama wrote:

is there a way to use the mod operator on two numbers… ex:

3 % 7 = 3
7 % 3 = 1

or like

3 mod 7 = 3… etc

thanks.

wow lol EDIT:
i realized i had typed in; nummodnum and not num mod num
… hah sorry it didn’t see the keyword mod

Read full topic
